content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello, Emilia. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month, is that acceptable to you?

I would like to clarify that the apartment is in a good location and it has all the necessary amenities. Additionally, I am a responsible and dependable tenant. I would like to ensure that I am on good terms with you as my landlord.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Emilia. I appreciate your interest in the apartment and your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm afraid I will need to consider some additional factors before making a decision. Would you be willing to provide me with some more information about yourself and your financial situation? This will help me determine if 900 Euros per month is a fair rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Sure, I am a student and I am currently studying at the University of Mannheim. I have a part-time job as a tutor for elementary school children and I am also looking for a part-time job on campus. I am trying to balance my studies and work to make ends meet. I have a good credit score and I have never had any late payments on my bills. I am a responsible and dependable person who always pays rent on time.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for providing that information, Emilia. It's great to hear that you are a responsible and dependable tenant. Based on your financial situation, I believe 900 Euros per month is a fair rental price for you. However, I would like to add a few conditions to the rental agreement. Firstly, I would like you to sign a one-year lease agreement, with a two-month notice period for either party. Secondly, I would like you to pay a security deposit of one month's rent upfront. Finally, I would like you to pay utilities and other incidental charges separately on a monthly basis.

If you agree to these conditions, I would be happy to accept your offer of 900 Euros per month as the rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine
